messages.subject: Olympia, WA Recital Reminder
messages.msgSnippet: Just a reminder that my daughter Meera s benefit piano recital for the Israeli-Palestinian Families of the Bereaved Forum for Peace (www.theparentscircle.com)
messages.messageBody:
Just a reminder that my daughter Meera's benefit piano recital for the
Israeli-Palestinian Families of the Bereaved Forum for Peace
(www.theparentscircle.com) is this Saturday (September 20th) at 7:30
p.m., at United Churches, 11th and Capital Way, in Olympia. Suggested
donation is $10, but no one will be turned away due to lack of funds.
Kids are especially invited (and, if they are budding musicians, they
should get a particular kick out of it.)

The representatives of the families themselves -- both Palestinian and
Israeli -- will be making a presentation at the same location on
October 4th, at 7:30. Again, all are invited.

Hope to see you there!

david
wwww.skylarksings.com
